title: Boots of Ostara
summaries: The Boots of Ostara are an armor item dropped by Lepus. When worn, they provide 3 defense and create grass on Dirt Blocks under the player's feet. They will also enable the wearer to perform "bunny hops" where each successive jump in a series will increase in height until a maximum height of 16 tiles is reached. Jumping with the Boots of Ostara equipped creates a green particle effect.

statistics.Tooltip: Fertilizes the soil and allows the wearer to perform a bunny hop
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
